like this

1.28.19  1:38 pm   hey man so i looked at your vid on genius and you were explaining one part of the lyrics where it was like a bob dylan song and like, going diagonal. and i was really glad because there was something there but i didn't know what
when i listened to "la de da de da de da day oh" and during the chorus i felt like there was a zig zag there

      and then it kind of smoothed out into a lanky wave of some sort and then climbed down to a stop? sorry for the rambling but thats what i was thinking of
so basically ive been thinking like, have you thought of any of your music in lines or shapes like that? if so, can you name any?
